lead_paragraph: Among the evidence under review were thumb drives, smartphones and business cards, which related to people currently and formerly at the New York Police Department and local elected officials.

headline.print_headline: Hearing Gives Peek at Evidence in Graft Case
headline.main: Prosecutor Offers Glimpse of Evidence in New York Police Corruption Case

snippet: Among the evidence under review were thumb drives, smartphones and business cards, which related to people currently and formerly at the New York Police Department and local elected officials....
abstract: Prosecutor Martin S Bell, in hearing for corruption case against Brooklyn businessman Jeremiah Reichberg, says authorities searching Reichberg's home witnessed family members trying to exit house with data-containing devices and business cards linked to elected officials and people at New York Police Dept; statement offers glimpse at evidence under review in case.
